overview:
Juan is the CEO of vBSEO, the #1 SEO plugging for vBulletin forums, and more recently has also started a sister company @140ware which has released products such as Tweetboard with more planned.

Based in Porto Rico Juan Muriente is a budding entrepreneur starting his first company Crawlability in 2004 and creating various products including vBSEO, LiveStats and vBSEO Sitemap Generator.

In 2009 Juan and his lead developer Oleg Ignatiuk opened up a new company @140ware where they began work on other products such as Tweetboard with further products such as Tweetboard.Local, Tweetboard.Embed and Tweetboard.Destination planned for the near future.

external_links.title: Tweetboard: Add a Twitter-Powered Forum to Your Website
Bring Twitter Talk To Your Site With Tweetboard
